name: Sinclair-calculator
body:
### Features.
* Calculate the Sinclair-Malone-Meltzer total

### Something missing?
If you think the app can be improved in any way, let me know! E-mail me at wendler531@stefankendall.com for any and all feedback.

![Screenshot 1](https://github.com/stefankendall/Sinclair-Calculator/raw/master/distribution/screenshots/Android/device-2012-01-21-175600.png)
tagline: Sinclair Calculator app for the iPhone, Android, and Amazon app stores
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
